title: $1.2 Million Jackpot Hit on Scientific Games' Shuffle Master Let It Ride Table Game at Mohegan Sun
content:
09/15/2015 10:00 AM ET 

09/14/2015 10:22 AM ET 

09/14/2015 10:00 AM ET 

Las Vegas - Scientific Games Corporation ("Scientific Games" or "the Company") today announced that a lucky player at Mohegan Sun in Uncasville, Connecticut, won $1,248,644 while playing the Shuffle Master Let It Ride proprietary table game on Saturday, Aug. 22. 

The huge table game win was made possible by the Company's Shuffle Master Game Manager 2 software that tracks progressive jackpots at 148 tables across Mohegan Sun's casinos: Casino of the Earth, Casino of the Sky, and Casino of the Wind. Game Manager 2 enables multi-level jackpots and multiple fully configurable reserve pools, and allows players to compete for multiple real-time incrementing meters with just one wager. 

The winner chose to remain anonymous. 

"This is certainly one of the largest jackpots ever hit on a table game," said Roger Snow, Senior Vice President of Tables and Shufflers at Scientific Games. "Jackpots of this size are truly life-altering, adding dramatic new levels of excitement in the table games pit. We congratulate this winner and Mohegan Sun on the amazing win. We're proud our games and casino systems could help make this happen." 

About Scientific Games 

Scientific Games Corporation (NASDAQ: SGMS) is a leading developer of technology-based products and services and associated content for worldwide gaming, lottery and interactive markets. The Company's portfolio includes gaming machines, game content and systems; table games products and shufflers; instant and draw-based lottery games; server-based lottery and gaming systems; sports betting technology; loyalty and rewards programs; and interactive content and services.
